front.title: Reoptimization of Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) Traffic Engineering (TE) loosely routed Label Switch Path (LSP) Locally

abstract.t: This document defines a mechanism for the local reoptimization of loosely routed MPLS and GMPLS (Generalized Multiprotocol Label Switching) Traffic Engineering (TE) LSPs signaled with RSVP-TE.This behavior of reoptimization is happened at loose node ,but not the ingress node .
